description: This file is a PHP script that generates a web page interface for managing LAN Ethernet settings on a network gateway device. It includes server-side PHP code for retrieving network interface information, as well as embedded JavaScript for handling user interactions and AJAX requests.

methods.name: getPort4XHSEnabled
methods.description: Determines if Port 4XHS (Port 4 for Xfinity Home Security) is enabled by checking specific device parameters.

methods.name: NameMap
methods.description: Maps the Ethernet port status to human-readable labels based on current operational mode and partner configuration.

methods.name: onsavePort4
methods.description: Handles the AJAX request to enable or disable Port 4XHS when the user toggles the checkbox.

methods.name: initEvents
methods.description: Initializes event handlers for the page elements, specifically the save button for Port 4XHS.
